name: Covid Defender (Ghost-cat)
description:
In this time, with the pandemic virus everywhere we neer to do our best to survive, help this little friend to collect all the food it can before the virus reach him, move yourself with the keyboard arrows (or asdw) and evade the virus, collect the fruit and use the antibacterial gel to destroy the virus.  

Fisrt game in Unity made for a pixelarium course.
